plot: Homer opens a successful snow-plowing business, only to inspire Barney to start a rival outfit that puts him out of work.

Homer buys a truck with an attached snow plow after he destroys his car, and to pay for it, he starts a snow shoveling business, calling himself Mr. Plow. It all goes off without a hitch, until he finds himself in competition with The Plow King, a.k.a. Barney Gumbel. Now begins the winter of discontent.—<Explorerds6789>
